title: Data from 93 Cars on Sale in the USA in 1993
description:
Description
The Cars93 data frame has 93 rows and 27 columns.
reference:
Cars were selected at random from among 1993 passenger car models that
were listed in both the Consumer Reports issue and the
PACE Buying Guide.  Pickup trucks and Sport/Utility vehicles were
eliminated due to incomplete information in the Consumer Reports
source.  Duplicate models (e.g., Dodge Shadow and Plymouth Sundance)
were listed at most once.

parameters.RPM: RPM (revs per minute at maximum horsepower).
parameters.Origin: Of non-USA or USA company origins? (factor).
parameters.Max.Price: Maximum Price (in $1,000): price for “a premium version”.
parameters.Man.trans.avail: Is a manual transmission version available? (yes or no, Factor).
parameters.Type:
Type: a factor with levels "Small", "Sporty",
"Compact", "Midsize", "Large" and "Van".
parameters.AirBags: Air Bags standard. Factor: none, driver only, or driver & passenger.
parameters.Rev.per.mile: Engine revolutions per mile (in highest gear).
parameters.Min.Price: Minimum Price (in $1,000): price for a basic version.
parameters.DriveTrain: Drive train type: rear wheel, front wheel or 4WD; (factor).
parameters.MPG.city: City MPG (miles per US gallon by EPA rating).
parameters.Price:
Midrange Price (in $1,000): average of Min.Price and
Max.Price.
parameters.Cylinders: Number of cylinders (missing for Mazda RX-7, which has a rotary engine).

format: This data frame contains the following columns:
